text: anaknea del ban ttuol kar changaoulobangheanh ku pitabrakd nasa anak noh nung ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh samreab khluoneng . haey anaknea del ban v nge vng ku pitabrakd nasa anak noh nung v nge v ng daoyokhluoneng . haey anak del theu v akrak min ach ttuol bantouk champoh babakamm robsa anakadtei ban laey . haey yeung min del daktondakamm norna mneak laey louhtrate yeung tengtang anakneasar na mneak( daembi ampeavneav puokke) cheamoun sen
